selection_reasoning: This selection combines the best-performing solutions overall (trial_5_8 and trial_6_0) with the most promising trial from the current generation (trial_7_3). It also maintains algorithmic diversity by including a hybrid physics-based approach (trial_7_2) and the original physics simulation (trial_0_2). The high failure rate in Generation 7 suggests we need to be cautious with complex implementations, focusing on robust approaches that can be incrementally improved. This balanced selection provides both strong performance baselines and diverse algorithmic approaches to explore in the next generation.

trial_selections.reasoning: This remains our best overall solution with score 2.633035. It uses a sophisticated basin-hopping approach with well-tuned parameters and multiple initialization strategies.
